title: Project-Based Social Studies Curriculum for Solving Societal Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to understand basic social phenomena and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Project-based learning applying constructivist pedagogy, where students investigate real-world social issues and derive solutions, emphasizing collaboration and data collection using digital tools.

learning_goals: Students can analyze real community issues and propose specific solutions.
Students can collaboratively produce creative project outcomes using digital tools.
Students can demonstrate critical thinking and self-directed learning skills during problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
